short_summary: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking Janitorial Services for the RCMP Killarney Detachment in Manitoba.
description: The contract will provide janitorial services for the RCMP Killarney Detachment, with a period of two years and an option for extension of up to three additional one-year periods. The tender is open to all suppliers, and the contract will be awarded based on the lowest evaluated price. The Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) for this solicitation is available on the Canada Buy Service. The digital quotation is available for download on the Canada Buy Service. Bidders are required to submit their proposals online through the Canada Buy Service.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Notice: Janitorial Services for RCMP Detachment

## Project Details

*   **Title (English):** Janitorial Services – RCMP Killarney Detachment
*   **Title (French):** Services de nettoyage - Détachement de la GRC de Killarney
*   **Reference Number:** cb-6560-82316219
*   **Amendment Number:** 1
*   **Solicitation Number:** M5000-20-2326/A
*   **Publication Date:** 2023-06-19

## Tender Overview

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites bids for janitorial services at RCMP Killarney Detachment, consisting of:

*   Labour, materials, equipment, transportation, and site supervision required to provide cleaning services 3 times a week
*   Services to be performed for a contract period of 2 years from the contract date, with an irrevocable option to extend for 3 additional one-year periods.

## Tender Requirements

*   Bidders must comply with all requirements outlined in the bid solicitation to be declared responsive.
*   Responsive bids will be evaluated on a lowest price basis.
*   Tenders must be submitted to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit as per page one of the Invitation to Tender (I.T.T.).

## Additional Requirements

*   The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada, and the integrity provisions are being applied in contracting activities.
*   Interested bidders are also encouraged to register on the Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) for increased visibility and potential contract opportunities.

## Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

*   **Name:** Sheena Simonson
*   **Email:** [sheena.simonson@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:sheena.simonson@rcmp-grc.gc.ca)
*   **Phone:** (306) 515-1653

## Tender Documents

The full tender notice, including tender documents, can be accessed at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities).

**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-07-24T16:00:00

**Amendment Date:** 2023-07-24

**Note:** This tender is now expired.
